name: ReRent
description: Inspired by a radical vision where apartment residents only pay rent when they're home and where valuable apartment spaces never go underutilized, ReRent enables completely turn-key home-sharing as the first ever renter-focused STR management platform.
one_liner: Inspired by a radical vision where apartment residents only pay rent when they're home and where valuable apartment spaces never go underutilized, ReRent enables completely turn-key home-sharing as the first ever renter-focused STR management platform.
